Race Route
Official Campsite
Contact us
The race starts at the Court House, across from the Topaz petrol station. It is an out and back route, which goes up the scenic Sky Road .... more
Shanaheever Campsite is the official race campsite.
Special rates for race entrants...more...
Registration will take place from 12.30 in O'Malley's Bar in Clifden.
Anyone who has entered the race prior to 5pm on the 5th September, will be sent their race number by post. For later entrants, please collect your number at registration. The race will begin at 2pm, at the court House, across from the Topaz Petrol station). There will be 2 water stations, one at the mid point and one at the finish line.

Public car Parking is available:
Beside the Station House Hotel on the N59 Galway rd (free).
At the Church beside the Court House across from the Topaz petrol station.
In the Supervalue car park on the Square (please note this car park operates shop hours).
Or on the street (free on Sundays).

Public toilets are available at: In Supervalue, on The Square (across from the Alcock and Brown; enter and turn left at the trolleys). At the Topaz petrol station.
The coach park, across from the Station House Hotel (coin operated)

Do you have what it takes?
